resources.string: Please allow %1$s to access your device details, otherwise the app cannot run.
To run this app, allow %1$s to access your device details by going to Settings and selecting the Phone permission
We need your permission to access some device features and information.
Select \"Allow\" on the next screen to use this app.
Tap \"Go to App info\" below, \nthen tap \"Permissions\" and turn on \"Phone\" \nto use this app.
